org.cloudifysource.esc.jclouds
Class JCloudsDeployer

java.lang.Object
  org.cloudifysource.esc.jclouds.JCloudsDeployer

public class JCloudsDeployer
extends Object

A JClouds based deployer that creates and queries JClouds complaint servers. All of the JClouds features used in the cloud ESM Machine Provisioning are called from this class.

Author:
barakme

createServer

public org.jclouds.compute.domain.NodeMetadata createServer(String serverName,
                                                            String locationId)
                                                     throws InstallerException
Starts up a server based on the deployer's template, and returns its meta data. The server may not have started yet when this call returns.

Parameters:
serverName - server name.
locationId - the id of the location in which to create the server.
Returns:
the new server meta data.
Throws:
InstallerException - .

createServers

public Set<? extends org.jclouds.compute.domain.NodeMetadata> createServers(String groupName,
                                                                            int numberOfMachines,
                                                                            String locationId)
                                                                     throws InstallerException
Creates the specified number of servers from the given template.

Parameters:
groupName - server group name.
numberOfMachines - number of machines.
locationId - the id of the location in which to create the server.
Returns:
the created nodes.
Throws:
InstallerException - if creation of one or more nodes failed.

getServer

public org.jclouds.compute.domain.NodeMetadata getServer(com.google.common.base.Predicate<org.jclouds.compute.domain.ComputeMetadata> filter)
Queries the cloud for a single server that matches the given critetia. If more then one is returned, throws an exception.

Parameters:
filter - the query filter.
Returns:
the node meta data, or null if no match is found.

getServerByID

public org.jclouds.compute.domain.NodeMetadata getServerByID(String serverID)
Looks for a server with an ID that matches the given ID.

Parameters:
serverID - the server ID.
Returns:
the node meta data, or null.

getServerByName

public org.jclouds.compute.domain.NodeMetadata getServerByName(String serverName)
Queries for a server whose name STARTS WITH the given name. Note that underscores in the name ('_') are replaced with blanks.

Parameters:
serverName - the server name.
Returns:
node meta data

getServers

Returns all nodes that match the given criteria.

Parameters:
filter - the filter criteria.
Returns:
the nodes.

the nodes.

Returns:
the node meta data, or null.

getTemplate

public org.jclouds.compute.domain.Template getTemplate(String locationId)
Returns the default template used to create new servers. Note that if the template has not been instantiated yet, it will be done in this call.

Returns:
the template.

                                   TimeUnit unit,
                                   long duration)
                            throws TimeoutException,
                                   InterruptedException
Shutdown the server.

Parameters:
serverId - the server id.
unit - time unit to wait.
duration - duration to wait.
Throws:
TimeoutException - if timeout expired.
InterruptedException - .

shutdownMachineGroup

public void shutdownMachineGroup(String group)
Shutdown all nodes in group.

Parameters:
group - group name.

shutdownMachinesWithIPs

public void shutdownMachinesWithIPs(Set<String> ips)
Shutdown servers by ips.

Parameters:
ips - list of IPs. Any node which has one of these IPs will be shut down.

getServerByTag

public org.jclouds.compute.domain.NodeMetadata getServerByTag(String tag)
Returns a server with a tag that equals the given tag. Note that comparison is also performed with the given tag with underscores removed.

Parameters:
tag - the tag to look for.
Returns:
the node meta data, or null.
